actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to ensure that farmland held by the Farmers Home Administration is sold at fair market value to qualified persons.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act with regard to farmland held by the Farmers Home Administration to: (1) restrict subsequent transfers; (2) require that farmland be offered to persons selected randomly from among eligible producers; and (3) require farmland to be sold at fair market value.

titles.title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to ensure that farmland held by the Farmers Home Administration is sold at fair market value to qualified persons.
